title: Blood and Wrath
description: Kai. Jax. Luka. Rion. Axel.She was taken from us…again.And now she’s in the hands of that sadistic psycho.But now thanks to our bond, we have abilities that surpass even the strongest of our kind.We’ll get her back…And when we do…Those who have hurt her will pay…Along with anyone else who gets in our way…
author: Rumer Hale
